item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Oscar Levant
item.description: "There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line." -- Oscar Levant

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Douglas MacArthur
item.description: "Whoever said the pen is mightier than the sword obviously never encountered automatic weapons." -- Douglas MacArthur

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If you were me, then I'd be you, and if I were you, then I'd hide somewhere far away." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Murphy's Law
item.description: "The chance of the bread falling with the buttered side down is directly proportional to the cost of the carpet." -- Murphy's Law

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Lee Benson
item.description: "When youre sharing a foxhole with another man, you don't worry about what color he is, just whether or not he will protect your back" -- Lee Benson

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Stick Boy liked Match Girl, He liked her a lot. He liked her cute figure, he thought she was hot. But could a flame ever burn for a match and a stick? It did quite literally; he burned up quick." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If I win, I'm a prodigy. If I lose, then I'm crazy. That's the way history is written." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Butler could kill you a hundred different ways without use of his armoury. Though I'm sure one would be quite sufficient." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Percy wouldn't notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby's hats." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "<i>Ginny!</i>" said Mr. Weasley, flabbergasted. "Haven't I taught you <i>anything</i>? What have I always told you? Never trust anything that can think for itself <i>if you can't see where it keeps its brain</i>?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Scott westerfeld
item.description: "Which was worse: a friend with brain damage, or one who despised you?" -- Scott westerfeld

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Over the centuries, mankind has tried many ways of combating the forces of evil... prayer, fasting, good works and so on. Up until Doom, no one seemed to have thought about the double-barrel shotgun. Eat leaden death, demon..." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake." -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Government exists to protect us from each other. Where government has gone beyond its limits is in deciding to protect us from ourselves." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Confidence is ignorance. If you're feeling cocky, it's because there's something you don't know." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Hey, look—your <i>girlfriend</i> is saying something." Artemis had a vast mental reserve of scathing comebacks at his disposal, but none of them covered girlfriend insults. He wasn't even sure if it was an insult. And if it was, who was being insulted? Him or the girl?" -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Cheyenne add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "I can't imagine what they're planning. But I can tell you two things. We won't like it, and it won't be legal." -- Eoin Colfer
